ayahs.meaning: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of all the worlds
The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
Master of the Day of Judgment
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help
Guide us to the straight path

ayahs.arabic: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
ayahs.meaning: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned Your anger or of those who have gone astray

surahs.nameMeaning: She That is to be Examined

ayahs.meaning: About what are they asking one another?

words.meaning: about what are they asking each other
options: about what are they asking each other
what is it they question about
what is it they dispute about

ayahs.meaning: About the great news
That over which they are in disagreement

words.meaning: about which they are in disagreement
options: about which they are in disagreement

ayahs.meaning: No! They are going to know
Then, no! They are going to know

words.meaning: then no, they will surely know
options: then no, they will surely know
again no, they will find out
once more, they will certainly realize
nay again, they will come to know

ayahs.meaning: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

words.meaning: did We not make the earth
options: did We not make the earth
have We not set the ground
did We not create the earth
have We not established the earth

ayahs.meaning: And the mountains as stakes?
And created you in pairs

words.meaning: and We created you in pairs
options: and We created you in pairs
and We made you as partners
and We created you as mates
and We formed you in couples

ayahs.meaning: And made your sleep for rest

words.meaning: and We made your sleep as rest
options: and We made your sleep as rest
and We made sleep a comfort for you
and We created sleep for your rest
and your sleep We made for recuperation

ayahs.meaning: And made the night as clothing

words.meaning: and We made the night as a covering
options: and We made the night as a covering
and We made the night like a garment
and We created night as a cloak
and We made nighttime a blanket

ayahs.meaning: And made the day for livelihood

words.meaning: and We made the day for livelihood
options: and We made the day for livelihood
and We created the daytime for your work
and We made daytime for your living
and the day We made for earning

ayahs.meaning: And We built above you seven strong heavens
And made a burning lamp

words.meaning: and We made a blazing lamp
options: and We made a blazing lamp
and We created a brilliant lamp
and We made the sun as a lamp
and We placed a glowing torch

ayahs.meaning: Indeed, the Day of Judgment is an appointed time
Indeed, for the righteous is achievement

options: certainly for those who fear Allah

ayahs.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
ayahs.transliteration: Yawma yaqoomu ar-roohu wal-mala-ikatu saffan la yatakallamoona illa man athina lahu ar-rahmanu waqala sawaba
ayahs.meaning: The Day when the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct

words.meaning: the Day the Spirit and angels stand in rows
options: the Day the Spirit and angels stand in rows
when the angels stand in lines
the Day Gabriel and angels form ranks
when all spiritual beings stand in order

words.arabic: لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَنُ
words.transliteration: la yatakallamoona illa man athina lahu ar-rahmanu
words.meaning: none will speak except whom the Most Merciful permits
options: none will speak except whom the Most Merciful permits
no one will talk unless Allah allows
only those permitted by the Merciful may speak
they cannot speak unless the Merciful grants permission

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
ayahs.transliteration: Inna antharnakum athaaban qareeba yawma yanthuru al-mar-u ma qaddamat yadahu wayaqoolu al-kafiru ya laytanee kuntu turaba
ayahs.meaning: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, 'Oh, I wish that I were dust!'

options: We have sent you a warning

words.meaning: oh I wish I were dust
options: oh I wish I were dust
if only I had been dirt
how I wish I were turned to dust
I wish I had been nothing but soil

ayahs.meaning: By those angels who extract with violence

options: by the ones who tear out

ayahs.meaning: And by those who remove with ease

options: by those who extract with ease

ayahs.meaning: And by those who glide serenely

words.meaning: and those who glide and float
options: and those who glide and float

ayahs.meaning: And those who race one another in a race

words.meaning: and those who race ahead swiftly
options: and those who race ahead swiftly
and those who outpace each other

ayahs.meaning: And those who carry out a command

words.meaning: and those who manage and command
options: and those who manage and command
and those who carry out orders

ayahs.meaning: On the Day the earth and mountains will convulse

words.meaning: the Day the convulsing event shakes everything
options: the Day the convulsing event shakes everything
the Day of the violent trembling

ayahs.meaning: And suddenly they will be on the surface of the earth

words.meaning: they will suddenly be on the earth's surface
options: they will suddenly be on the earth's surface
they will immediately be in the open land
they will be on the bare earth
they will be on the plain

ayahs.meaning: Has there reached you the story of Musa?

words.meaning: has the story of Musa reached you
options: has the story of Musa reached you
have you heard the tale of Moses
do you know the account of Musa
has the news of Musa come to you

ayahs.meaning: And said I am your lord, the most high

words.meaning: and said I am your supreme lord
options: and said I am your supreme lord
and claimed to be the highest god
and declared I am your greatest master
and said I am your lord most high

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَى
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-amma man khafa maqama rabbihi wanaha an-nafsa ani al-hawa
ayahs.meaning: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from inclination

words.meaning: whoever feared standing before his Lord
options: whoever feared standing before his Lord
the one who is in awe of his Lord
whoever is conscious of his Lord
he who dreads facing his Lord
and held his soul back from whims
and stopped his soul from lusting
and prevented himself from following vain desires

ayahs.meaning: Then indeed, Paradise will be his refuge

options: then certainly the abode of bliss

ayahs.meaning: They ask you about the Hour: when is its arrival?

words.meaning: they ask you about the Hour
options: they ask you about the Hour
they question you about the Day of Judgment
they inquire about the Last Hour
they ask when the Hour will come

ayahs.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
ayahs.transliteration: Ka-annahum yawma yarawnahaa lam yalbasoo illa ashiyyatan aw duhaha
ayahs.meaning: On the Day they see it, it will seem as though they had not remained except an evening or its morning

words.meaning: when they see it that Day, it will seem as if
options: when they see it that Day, it will seem as if
on the Day they witness it, they will think
when they behold it, it will appear as if
on the Day they experience it, as if

words.arabic: لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
words.transliteration: lam yalbasoo illa ashiyyatan aw duhaha
words.meaning: they had not stayed except one evening or morning
options: they had not stayed except one evening or morning
they only lingered for a brief afternoon
they remained only a single morning
they only lived for a few hours

ayahs.meaning: He frowned and turned away
Because a blind man came to him

options: since a man came to him
the one who could not see

ayahs.meaning: But what would make you know? Perhaps he might purify himself

words.meaning: and what would make you know
options: and what would make you know
maybe he seeks to be cleansed

ayahs.meaning: Or be reminded and the reminder would benefit him?

options: or he could receive a reminder

words.meaning: and the reminder would benefit him
options: and the reminder would benefit him
and the message would help him
and the reminder would do him good

ayahs.meaning: As for he who thinks himself without need

words.meaning: as for the one who considers himself self-sufficient
options: as for the one who considers himself self-sufficient
as for the one who feels rich

ayahs.meaning: To him you give attention
And not upon you is any guilt if he will not purify himself

words.meaning: and there is no blame on you
options: and there is no blame on you
and it is not your concern
and no fault is on you

words.meaning: if he does not purify himself
options: if he does not purify himself
if he does not want to be cleansed
if he does not seek purity

ayahs.meaning: But as for he who came to you striving eagerly

words.meaning: as for the one who comes to you eagerly
options: as for the one who comes to you eagerly
but as for whoever strives to reach you
as for the one who approaches you with effort
as for the one who hastens to you

ayahs.meaning: And he fears Allah

options: and he has awe of Allah
and he has reverence for Allah

ayahs.meaning: From him you are distracted

words.meaning: you are distracted away from him
options: you are distracted away from him
you turn your attention from him

ayahs.meaning: No! Indeed, the Quran is a reminder
So whoever wills may remember it
But when there comes the Deafening Blast
The Day a man will flee from his brother
Some faces that Day will be bright
Laughing, rejoicing at good news
And other faces, that Day, will have upon them dust

options: and some faces on that occasion

ayahs.meaning: Covered by darkness
Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones

options: they are the rejectors of faith
they are the ones who disbelieved

ayahs.meaning: When the sun is wrapped up in darkness
And when the stars fall, losing their lustre
And when the mountains are set in motion
And when full-term she-camels are neglected
And when the wild beasts are gathered
And when the seas are set aflame
And when the souls are paired
And when the girl who was buried alive is asked
For what sin was she killed?
And when the pages are spread open
And when the sky is stripped away
And when Hellfire is set ablaze
And when Paradise is brought near
A soul will then know what it has brought
So I swear by the retreating stars
Those that run and set

options: those that go beneath the horizon

ayahs.meaning: And by the night as it closes in
And by the dawn as it breathes
Indeed, the Quran is the word of a noble Messenger

words.meaning: is the word of a noble messenger
options: is the word of a noble messenger
is speech of an honored messenger
is the speech of a dignified angel

ayahs.arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Thee quwwatin inda thee al-arshi makeen
ayahs.meaning: Possessing power, with the Owner of the Throne, secure in position

words.meaning: highly positioned with the Owner of the Throne
options: highly positioned with the Owner of the Throne
secure near the Lord of the Throne
firmly established with the King of the Throne
honored with the Possessor of the Throne

ayahs.meaning: Obeyed there and trustworthy
And your companion is not crazy
And he has already seen him in the clear horizon

options: and he has indeed seen him

ayahs.meaning: And he is not a withholder of the unseen

words.meaning: and he is not withholding the unseen
options: and he is not withholding the unseen
and he does not hide what is revealed
and he does not keep back the knowledge
and he is not greedy with what is hidden

ayahs.meaning: And it is not the word of an accursed devil

words.meaning: and it is not the word of a devil
options: and it is not the word of a devil
and it did not come from Satan
and no evil spirit spoke it

ayahs.meaning: So where are you going?

options: then which way will you go

ayahs.meaning: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

words.meaning: it is nothing but a reminder
options: it is nothing but a reminder

ayahs.meaning: For whoever wills among you to take a right course

options: for any of you who chooses
for those among you who desire

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
ayahs.transliteration: Wama tashaaoona illa an yashaa Allahu rabbu al-aalameen
ayahs.meaning: And you do not will except that Allah wills — Lord of the worlds
When the sky breaks apart
And when the stars fall, scattering
And when the seas are erupted
And when the graves are overturned
A soul will then know what it has put forth and kept back

words.meaning: and what it has kept back
options: and what it has kept back

ayahs.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
ayahs.transliteration: Ya ayyuha al-insanu ma gharraka birabbika al-kareem
ayahs.meaning: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous?

words.meaning: about your Lord, the Most Generous
options: about your Lord, the Most Generous

ayahs.meaning: Who created you, proportioned you, and assembled you

ayahs.arabic: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
ayahs.transliteration: Fee ayyi suratin ma shaa rakkabak
ayahs.meaning: In whatever form He willed, He assembled you
No! But you deny the Recompense

options: you deny the Day of Judgment

ayahs.meaning: And indeed, appointed over you are keepers
Noble and recording
They know whatever you do
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire

options: will be in the raging fire

ayahs.meaning: They will enter it on the Day of Recompense

words.meaning: they will enter it/be burned in it
options: they will enter it/be burned in it
they will be thrown into it

ayahs.meaning: And they will not be absent from it

words.meaning: they will not escape from it
options: they will not escape from it
they cannot be absent from it

ayahs.meaning: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

words.meaning: and what can make you know
options: and what can make you know

words.meaning: what is the Day of Judgment
options: what is the Day of Judgment
what is the Day of Recompense
what that Day of Reckoning is
what the Day of Religion is

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
ayahs.transliteration: Thumma ma adraka ma yawmu ad-deen
ayahs.meaning: Then what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

words.meaning: then what can make you know
options: then what can make you know

words.meaning: what is the Day of Recompense
options: what is the Day of Recompense
what the Day of Judgment is
what the Day of Reckoning is

ayahs.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلَّهِ
ayahs.transliteration: Yawma la tamliku nafsun linafsin shay-an wal-amru yawma-ithin lillah
ayahs.meaning: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul anything, and the command that Day is entirely with Allah

words.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا
words.transliteration: Yawma la tamliku nafsun linafsin shay-an
words.meaning: the Day no soul can help another soul at all
options: the Day no soul can help another soul at all
when no person can benefit another
when no one can aid anyone else
when no soul has power for another

words.meaning: and authority that Day belongs to Allah
options: and authority that Day belongs to Allah
and all command belongs to Allah
and the decision is Allah's alone
and sovereignty that Day is Allah's

ayahs.meaning: Woe to those who give less than due

words.meaning: to those who cheat in measure
options: to those who cheat in measure
to those who give short measure

ayahs.arabic: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
ayahs.transliteration: Allatheena itha iktaloo ala an-nasi yastafoon
ayahs.meaning: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full

options: when they weigh out for themselves

ayahs.meaning: But if they give by measure or weight to others, they cause loss

words.meaning: when they measure or weigh for others
options: when they measure or weigh for others

ayahs.meaning: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

options: that they will be raised up
that they will be held accountable

ayahs.meaning: For a tremendous Day
The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

words.meaning: before the Lord of the worlds
options: before the Lord of the worlds
before the Sustainer of all beings

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Kalla inna kitaba al-fujjari lafee sijjeen
ayahs.meaning: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
ayahs.transliteration: Kalla inna kitaba al-abrari lafee illiyyeen
ayahs.meaning: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in illiyyeen

ayahs.arabic: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ وَفِي ذَلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
ayahs.transliteration: Khitamuhu miskun wafee thalika falyatanafasi al-mutanafisoon
ayahs.meaning: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete

words.meaning: let those who compete, compete for this
options: let those who compete, compete for this
let the eager ones strive for this
let those who race, race for this

ayahs.arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
ayahs.transliteration: Hal thuwwiba al-kuffaru ma kanoo yafAAaloon
ayahs.meaning: Have the disbelievers been rewarded for what they used to do?

words.meaning: have the disbelievers been paid back
options: have the disbelievers been paid back
have those who denied been recompensed
have the rejectors received their due

words.meaning: for what they used to do
options: for what they used to do

ayahs.meaning: When the sky has split open
And has responded to its Lord and was obligated to

options: and has submitted to its Lord
and has listened to its Lord
and has responded to its Lord

ayahs.meaning: And when the earth has been extended
And has cast out what was within it and relinquished it

words.meaning: and throws out what is within it
options: and throws out what is within it
and releases what is inside it

ayahs.meaning: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated to

options: and has submitted to its Lord
and has listened to its Lord
and has responded to its Lord

ayahs.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَى رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
ayahs.transliteration: Ya ayyuha al-insanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqeeh
ayahs.meaning: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with great exertion and will meet Him

options: and you will return to Him

ayahs.meaning: As for he who is given his record in his right hand
He will be judged with an easy account

words.meaning: will be judged with an easy reckoning
options: will be judged with an easy reckoning

ayahs.meaning: And will return to his people in happiness

words.meaning: and will return to his family
options: and will return to his family
and will go back to his people
and will be reunited with his loved ones

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-amma man ootiya kitabahu waraa thahrihi
ayahs.meaning: But as for he who is given his record behind his back
He will cry out for destruction
And will enter a blaze

words.meaning: and will enter a blazing fire
options: and will enter a blazing fire
and will be thrown into fire

ayahs.meaning: Indeed, he had been among his people in happiness

words.meaning: indeed he was among his people
options: indeed he was among his people
truly he lived with his family
he indeed was with his companions
he used to be with his household

ayahs.meaning: Indeed, he had thought he would never return to Allah

ayahs.arabic: بَلَى إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
ayahs.transliteration: Bala inna rabbahu kana bihi baseera
ayahs.meaning: Yes indeed! His Lord was ever Seeing of him

words.meaning: his Lord was ever Seeing him
options: his Lord was ever Seeing him
his Lord was watching over him
his Lord was fully aware of him

ayahs.meaning: So I swear by the twilight glow
And by the night and what it envelops
And by the moon when it becomes full

options: when it is at its fullest

ayahs.meaning: You will surely travel from state to state

options: you will without doubt journey through

ayahs.meaning: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe?

words.meaning: so what is wrong with them
options: so what is wrong with them
what is the matter with them

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-itha quri-a alayhimu al-qur-anu la yasjudoon
ayahs.meaning: And when the Quran is recited to them, they do not prostrate

words.meaning: when the Quran is recited to them
options: when the Quran is recited to them
when verses are read to them
when Allah's words are presented to them

ayahs.meaning: But those who have disbelieved deny
But Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves

options: what they conceal in their hearts

ayahs.meaning: So give them tidings of a painful punishment

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waamiloo as-salihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnoon
ayahs.meaning: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

options: other than those who accepted faith

ayahs.meaning: By the sky containing great stars
And by the promised Day
And by the witness and what is witnessed
Cursed were the companions of the trench
The fire full of fuel
When they were sitting over it

options: while they were seated by it

ayahs.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَى مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
ayahs.transliteration: Wahum ala ma yafaloona bil-mu'mineena shuhud
ayahs.meaning: And they witnessed what they were doing to the believers

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
ayahs.transliteration: Wama naqamoo minhum illa an yu'minoo billahi al-azeezi al-hameed
ayahs.meaning: And they resented them for nothing except that they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy

words.meaning: they had no grievance against them
options: they had no grievance against them

ayahs.arabic: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاللَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
ayahs.transliteration: Allathee lahu mulku as-samawati wal-ard wallahu ala kulli shay'in shaheed
ayahs.meaning: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness

words.meaning: dominion of the heavens and earth
options: dominion of the heavens and earth

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
ayahs.transliteration: Inna allatheena fatanoo al-mu'mineena wal-mu'minati thumma lam yatooboo falahum athabu jahannama walahum athabu al-hareq
ayahs.meaning: Indeed, those who have tortured believing men and women, and then not repented, will have the punishment of Hell

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ذَلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
ayahs.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waamiloo as-salihati lahum jannatun tajree min tahtiha al-anharu thalika al-fawzu al-kabeer
ayahs.meaning: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe

words.meaning: indeed the seizing of your Lord
options: indeed the seizing of your Lord
truly the grip of your Lord
indeed the wrath of your Lord
verily the vengeance of your Lord

ayahs.meaning: Indeed, it is He who originates and repeats
And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate
Owner of the Throne, the Glorious
Effecter of what He intends

options: Able to do what He wills

ayahs.meaning: Has there come to you the story of the soldiers

words.meaning: has there come to you the story of
options: has there come to you the story of
do you know the account of

ayahs.meaning: Pharaoh and Thamud?
But those who disbelieve are in persistent denial
But Allah encompasses them from behind
But this is an honored Quran

options: rather it is a noble Quran

ayahs.meaning: In a Preserved Tablet
By the sky and the night comer
And what can make you know what is the night comer?

words.meaning: and what will make you know
options: and what will make you know

ayahs.meaning: It is the piercing star

ayahs.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
ayahs.transliteration: In kullu nafsin lamma alayha hafith
ayahs.meaning: Every soul has over it a protector
So let man observe from what he was created
He was created from a fluid, ejected
Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs
Indeed, He is able to return him

words.meaning: is certainly able to return him
options: is certainly able to return him
has power to bring him back

ayahs.meaning: On the Day when hidden things are revealed

ayahs.arabic: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Fama lahu min quwwatin wala nasir
ayahs.meaning: Then he will have no power and no helper

words.meaning: then he will have no power
options: then he will have no power
then no strength remains for him

ayahs.meaning: By the sky which returns rain

options: by the sky that sends rain
by the sky with its cycle

ayahs.meaning: And by the earth which splits

words.meaning: by the earth that splits open
options: by the earth that splits open

ayahs.meaning: Indeed, it is a decisive word
And it is not amusement
Indeed, they are plotting a plot
And I am planning a plan
So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile

words.meaning: so give respite to the disbelievers
options: so give respite to the disbelievers
so be patient with the disbelievers
let them be for a moment

ayahs.meaning: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High
Who created and proportioned
And who destined and guided
And who brings out the pasture
And then makes it dark debris
We will make you recite and you will not forget

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَى
ayahs.transliteration: Illa ma shaa Allahu innahu yalamu al-jahra wama yakhfa
ayahs.meaning: Except what Allah wills. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden
And We will ease you toward ease

options: and We will facilitate for you

ayahs.meaning: So remind, if the reminder should benefit
The one who fears Allah will be reminded
But the most wretched will avoid it
Who will enter the great Fire

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَى
ayahs.transliteration: Thumma la yamootu feeha wala yahya
ayahs.meaning: Then neither will he die therein nor live

options: death will not come to him

ayahs.meaning: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
And mentions the name of his Lord and prays

words.meaning: and mentions the name of his Lord
options: and mentions the name of his Lord

ayahs.meaning: But you prefer the life of this world
While the Hereafter is better and more enduring
Indeed, this is in the former scriptures
The scriptures of Ibrahim and Musa
Has there come to you the news of the Overwhelming Event?
Some faces that Day will be humbled
Laboring and exhausted
They will enter a blazing Fire
They will be given drink from a boiling spring

ayahs.arabic: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Laysa lahum taaamun illa min daree
ayahs.meaning: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous thorny plant

words.meaning: there is no food for them
options: there is no food for them
no food will be offered to them

ayahs.arabic: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
ayahs.transliteration: La yusminu wala yughnee min joo
ayahs.meaning: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger
Other faces that Day will be joyful
Satisfied with their effort
In a Garden, lofty
Therein they will hear no unsuitable speech
Therein is a flowing spring
Therein are couches raised high
And cups set in place
And cushions lined up
And carpets spread around

ayahs.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
ayahs.transliteration: Afala yanthuroona ila al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
ayahs.meaning: Do they not look at the camels — how they are created?
And at the sky — how it is raised?
And at the mountains — how they are erected?
And at the earth — how it is spread out?
So remind, for you are only a reminder
You are not over them a controller

options: you have no power over them
you are not responsible for them

ayahs.meaning: But whoever turns away and disbelieves
Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment
Indeed, to Us is their return
Then indeed upon Us is their account
By the morning brightness
And by the night when it covers with darkness

ayahs.transliteration: Ma wadda'aka rabbuka wa ma qala
ayahs.meaning: Your Lord has not forsaken you, nor has He detested you
And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life]
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied
Did He not find you an orphan and give you refuge?
And He found you lost and guided you
And He found you poor and made you self-sufficient
So as for the orphan, do not oppress him
And as for the petitioner, do not repel him
And as for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it
Did We not expand for you your breast?
And We removed from you your burden
Which had weighed upon your back
And raised high for you your repute
For indeed, with hardship will be ease
Indeed, with hardship will be ease
So when you have finished, then strive [in worship]
And to your Lord direct your longing
By the fig and the olive
And by Mount Sinai
And by this secure city [Makkah]

ayahs.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
ayahs.meaning: We have certainly created man in the best of stature
Then We return him to the lowest of the low

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Illal-ladhina amanu wa 'amilu-s-salihat falahum ajrun ghayru mamnun
ayahs.meaning: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted
So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
Is not Allah the most just of judges?
Read in the name of your Lord who created
Created man from a clinging substance
Read, and your Lord is the Most Generous
Who taught by the pen
Taught man that which he knew not
No! Indeed, man transgresses
Because he sees himself self-sufficient
Indeed to your Lord is the return
Have you seen the one who forbids
A servant when he prays
Have you seen if he is upon guidance
Or enjoins righteousness/piety
Have you seen if he denies and turns away
Does he not know that Allah sees?

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
ayahs.transliteration: Kalla la-in lam yantahi lanasfa-an binnaasiyah
ayahs.meaning: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock
A lying, sinning forelock
Then let him call his associates
We will call the angels of Hell
No! Do not obey him. Prostrate and draw near to Allah
Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

ayahs.arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
ayahs.meaning: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months

ayahs.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Tanazzalul-mala'ikatu war-ruhu fiha bi idhni rabbihim min kulli amr
ayahs.meaning: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn

ayahs.arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّى تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
ayahs.transliteration: Lam yakuni allatheena kafaru min ahli alkitabi walmushrikeena munfakkeena hatta ta'tiyahumu albayyinatu
ayahs.meaning: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted until there came to them clear evidence

ayahs.arabic: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
ayahs.transliteration: Rasoolun mina Allahi yatlu suhufa mutahharah
ayahs.meaning: A messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
Within which are correct writings

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
ayahs.transliteration: Wama tafarraqa allatheena ootoo alkitaba illa min badi ma ja-athumu albayyinatu
ayahs.meaning: And those who were given the Scripture did not become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَذَلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
ayahs.transliteration: Wama omiroo illa liyabudoo Allaha mukhliseena lahu ad-deena hunafaa wayuqeemoo as-salata wayu'too az-zakata wathalika deenu alqayyimah
ayahs.meaning: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أُولَئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
ayahs.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaru min ahli alkitabi walmushrikeena fee nari jahannama khalideena feeha olaika hum sharru albariyyah
ayahs.meaning: Indeed, those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
ayahs.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waamiloo as-salihati olaika hum khayru albariyyah
ayahs.meaning: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds — they are the best of creatures

ayahs.arabic: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ذَلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
ayahs.transliteration: Jazaohum inda rabbihim jannatu adnin tajree min tahtiha al-anharu khalideena feeha abadan radiya Allahu anhum waradoo anhu thalika liman khashiya rabbah
ayahs.meaning: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
And the earth discharges its burdens
And man says: 'What is [wrong] with it?'
That Day, it will report its news
Because your Lord has commanded it

ayahs.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
ayahs.meaning: That Day, the people will depart in groups to be shown their deeds

ayahs.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
ayahs.transliteration: Faman ya'mal mithqala zarratin khayran yarah
ayahs.meaning: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it

ayahs.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
ayahs.transliteration: Wa man ya'mal mithqala zarratin sharran yarah
ayahs.meaning: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it
By the racers, panting
And the producers of sparks [when] striking
And the chargers at dawn
Who raise thereby clouds of dust
Arriving thereby in the center collectively
Indeed, mankind is ungrateful to his Lord
And indeed, he is to that a witness
And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense

ayahs.arabic: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
ayahs.transliteration: Afala ya'lamu idha bu'thira ma fil qubur
ayahs.meaning: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
And that within the breasts is made apparent
Indeed, their Lord with them that Day is fully Acquainted
The Striking Calamity
What is the Striking Calamity?
And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed
And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up
So as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds]
He will be in a pleasant life
But as for one whose scales are light
His refuge will be an abyss
And what can make you know what that is?
It is a Fire, intensely hot
Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
Until you visit the graveyards
No! You are going to know
Then no! You are going to know
No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty
You will surely see the Hellfire
Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty
Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure
By time
Indeed, mankind is in loss

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
ayahs.transliteration: Illal-ladhina amanu wa 'amilu-s-salihat wa tawassaw bil-haqqi wa tawassaw bis-sabr
ayahs.meaning: Except those who believe, do righteous deeds, and advise each other to truth and patience
Woe to every scorner and mocker
Who collects wealth and continuously counts it
He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal
No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher
And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled
Which mounts directed at the hearts
Indeed, it will be closed down upon them
In extended columns

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
ayahs.transliteration: Alam tara kayfa fa'ala rabbuka bi'ashabil fil
ayahs.meaning: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
And He sent against them birds in flocks
Striking them with stones of hard clay
And He made them like eaten straw
For the accustomed security of the Quraysh
Their security in the caravan of winter and summer
Let them worship the Lord of this House

ayahs.arabic: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Alladhi at'amahum min ju'in wa amanahum min khawf
ayahs.meaning: Who has fed them from hunger and made them safe from fear
Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
For that is the one who drives away the orphan
And does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who pray
Who are heedless of their prayer
Who make show of their deeds
And withhold simple assistance
Indeed, We have granted you Al-Kawthar
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice
Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off
Say: O disbelievers
I do not worship what you worship
Nor are you worshippers of what I worship
Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship
Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship
For you is your religion, and for me is my religion
When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest

ayahs.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
ayahs.transliteration: Wa ra'aytan-nasa yadkhuluna fi dinillahi afwaja
ayahs.meaning: And you see the people entering the religion of Allah in multitudes

ayahs.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
ayahs.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirh, innahu kana tawwaba
ayahs.meaning: Then exalt your Lord with praise and seek His forgiveness; indeed He is ever Accepting of repentance

ayahs.transliteration: Tabbat yada abi lahabin wa tabb
ayahs.meaning: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he

ayahs.arabic: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.transliteration: Ma aghna 'anhu maluhu wa ma kasab
ayahs.meaning: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained
He will burn in a Fire of blazing flame
And his wife - the carrier of firewood
Around her neck is a rope of twisted fiber
Say: He is Allah, [who is] One
Allah, the Eternal Refuge
He neither begets nor was He born

ayahs.transliteration: Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad
ayahs.meaning: Nor is there to Him any equivalent
Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
From the evil of that which He created

ayahs.transliteration: Wa min sharri ghasiqin idha waqab
ayahs.meaning: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
And from the evil of the blowers in knots

ayahs.transliteration: Wa min sharri hasidin idha hasad
ayahs.meaning: And from the evil of an envier when he envies
Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind
The Sovereign of mankind
The God of mankind
From the evil of the retreating whisperer
Who whispers into the breasts of mankind
From among the jinn and mankind
